summary.span: 显示要在 控件中使用的复选框用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a check box user interface (UI) to use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的用于显示二元或三元的复选框用户界面提供的信息。The class is a specialized type of used to display binary or ternary information presented through a check box UI. 在默认二进制模式下，单元格可以包含的值`true`或`false`。In the default binary mode, the cells can hold values of `true` or `false`. 在三元模式下，单元格可以之一值。In ternary mode, the cells take on one of the values. 属性确定二元或三元模式是否有效。The property determines whether binary or ternary mode is in effect. 列类型专用于保存此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列内的单元格模式的现有后，设置该列的属性设置为要用作一种模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关的属性都是相似的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格基于模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格，如有必要刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 当前单元格时，则属性始终为`true`。When the current cell is a , the property is always `true`. 通常情况下，复选框单元格的值被合适的存储，如任何其他数据，或用于执行批量操作。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果你想要立即当用户单击复选框单元格，可以处理响应事件，但此事件发生之前更新单元格的值。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果在单击时需要的新值，一种方法是计算所需的值将根据当前值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一种方法是立即提交更改并处理事件以对其做出响应。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要提交更改，单击该单元格时，你必须处理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格是一个复选框单元格，则调用方法并传入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来跟踪哪些员工在办公室中。The following code example uses a to track which employees are in the office. 列由组成对象。The column is made up of objects. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准操作的复选框允许有两种状态： checked 和 unchecked。The standard operation of a check box allows for two states: checked and unchecked. 当`threeState`参数设置为`true`，允许其他、 不确定状态，这以可视方式表示的灰色部分检查。When the `threeState` parameter is set to `true`, an additional, indeterminate state is allowed, which is visually denoted by a grey partial check.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定一种状态关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将"turnedOff"与相关联`false`，则属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将单元格的值转换为所指示的类型的等效显示值属性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 该控件将单元格的值传递给此方法`value`参数。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法首先尝试将转换`value`到或值使用， ，并如果已设置的属性。This method first attempts to convert `value` to a or value using the , , and properties if they have been set. 如果转换成功，事件发生。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果此事件或处理程序集没有处理程序属性设置为`true`，将引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果转换成功或没有处理程序事件并且它不会设置属性设置为`true`，则事件发生。If the conversion is successful or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. 一个事件处理程序可以修改这两`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果未设置该处理程序不会属性设置为`true`，但是，此方法设置`value`使用的格式设置属性`cellStyle`对象。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 这可能会导致额外事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式设置成功，`context`参数值包括值，此方法返回版本复制到剪贴板的格式化值。If formatting is successful and the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the version of the formatted value for copying to the Clipboard. 否则，此方法返回中显示的格式化的值控件。Otherwise, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定一种状态关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将"turnedOff"与相关联`false`，则属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 三元模式中的第三个状态通常表示一个未初始化或不确定的值。The third state in ternary mode typically represents an uninitialized or indeterminate value. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 与不同的列属性中，该单元格属性不会自动更新关联的单元格样式时更改其值的属性。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 当你更改该单元格属性值设置为`true`，请务必设置返回的对象的属性属性设置为。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to . 当你更改属性值设置为`false`，请务必设置属性设置为`false`。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用来跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将"turnedOff"与相关联`false`，则属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
